changeSet.sql: -- migrate error records INSERT INTO ${database.defaultSchemaName}.error_records_lb SELECT r.id AS id, -- er.id AS id, -- er.jsonb->>'id' AS id, er.jsonb->>'content' AS content, (er.jsonb->>'description')::varchar(1024) AS description -- er.creation_date AS creationDate, -- er.created_by AS createdBy FROM ${database.defaultSchemaName}.records r INNER JOIN ${database.defaultSchemaName}.error_records er ON r.jsonb->>'errorRecordId' = er.jsonb->>'id';
